pageTitle: Best Financial Advisors in Lee's Summit
metaDescription: Find top-rated financial advisors in Lee's Summit. Expert guidance for retirement planning, wealth management, and investment strategies.

Edward Jones - Financial Advisor: Joel Wilson, CFP®|CEPA®

heroDescription: Lee's Summit, Missouri, is a vibrant suburban city known for its family-friendly atmosphere and strong community engagement.
landscapeDescription: The economy of Lee's Summit is driven by a mix of retail, healthcare, and education sectors. Its proximity to Kansas City enhances its economic opportunities.
uniqueNeeds: Lee's Summit requires a focus on sustainable growth, affordable housing, and infrastructure improvements to support its expanding population.
citySpecificRiskAdvice: Lee's Summit's retail and healthcare focus may face economic downturn risks. Housing market appreciation raises bubble concerns, and tornado risks necessitate disaster preparedness.

sections.title: Economic Growth
sections.description: According to BEA (2023), Lee's Summit has seen a steady economic growth rate of 3.5%, driven primarily by local retail and service sectors.

sections.title: Wealth Demographics
sections.description: According to Census (2023), the median household income in Lee's Summit is approximately $75,000, reflecting a growing middle-class population.

sections.title: Advisor Specializations
sections.description: Based on BLS (2023), financial advisors in Lee's Summit are increasingly specializing in retirement planning and investment management.

sections.title: Cost of Living
sections.description: According to BLS (2024), Lee's Summit's cost of living is 5% lower than the national average, making it an attractive place for families.

sections.title: Real Estate Market
sections.description: According to Zillow (2024), the real estate market in Lee's Summit is competitive, with home prices rising 8% year-over-year, indicating strong demand.

sections.title: Business Environment
sections.description: According to Fortune (2024), Lee's Summit offers a favorable business climate with low taxes and incentives for small businesses, fostering entrepreneurship.
